name: The depths of the mind
description:
Try to get out of yourself but can you?

Depression engulfs you and these are the feelings that remain, hate, anger and fear, but only feelings can save you.

The in-game videos are real, and if you have a problem with that, don't play

This game was made in three days and probably continues !

You probably can't read this text, but

:سلام دوستان دولوپر این بازی ایرانیه و احتمالا یه نسخه کامل فارسی متفاوت بیاد
